entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. A few rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
